name: Senior Radio Access Engineer/ Старший инженер радиодоступа
description:
KAZ Minerals Russia is looking for potential candidates for the position of Senior Radio Access Engineer within IT Department in our Moscow office (6 months) and than Peschanka site

Structural division: IT Department

Report to: Head of Camp IT Infrastructure

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Higher education in telecommunications or Information technology;
  • 5-7 years of experience in telecom systems construction and commissioning works;
  • 3-5 years of experience in project development for radio systems and other industrial telecom systems;
  • Working experience with design and construction contractors. Including development of Technical Specifications/Requirements, control of design documentation;
  • Strong knowledge of radio telecommunications technologies, including industrial (DMR) and commercial standards (LTE, Radio relay)
  • Strong knowledge of the cable networks technologies and data transmission technologies (including fiber optic network, satellite communications, broadband wireless communications)
  • Good knowledge of modern equipment production lines from industrial leading telecommunication vendors;
  • Training certificates of main telecom equipment manufacturers and knowledge Motorola, Cisco, Nokia, Ericsson, Huawei vendors equipment will be as advantage
  • English – Intermediate.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Prepare scope of works for the creation of radio access networks and telecommunication systems.
  • Create Scope of works for telecommunication systems, taking into account the needs and initial data from related departments.
  • Formulate proposals, identify the advantages and disadvantages of technical solutions, select the final technical solution for the organization of data transmission networks and transport communication networks for them.
  • Design and create telecommunication and radio access systems, including DMR, LTE, private LTE networks, at the facilities of the enterprise.
  • Carry out the development and maintenance of project documentation for the implementation of telecommunication systems and software at the facilities of the enterprise.
  • Prepare and organize tender documentation for the selection of a contractor (operator) or supplier of services or equipment for the modernization or construction of telecommunication systems.
  • Timely prepare proposals for the modernization of solutions for designed and operated systems.
  • Monitor the progress of construction, maintenance and operation of telecommunication networks at the enterprise, carried out by the company's personnel and contractors.
  • Organize the maintenance and operation of the enterprise's telecommunication networks.
  • Monitor the state of telecommunication networks on Peschanka.
  • Organize and carry out diagnostics, troubleshooting and restoration of telecommunication systems.
  • Organize and timely carry out preventive maintenance of telecommunication systems equipment in accordance with the rules and instructions of the manufacturer for each type of equipment and software.

CONDITIONS:

  • Employment specifications: Direct contract with KAZ Minerals Russia LLC;
  • Work schedule: Monday-Friday: from 9 am till 6 pm/ Rotation (45/45)
  • Competitive salary and benefits;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Corporate lunches;
  • Location: "Moscow city"/Peschanka site (Chukotka)
